name: 396 Queen St - 6 Month Checks
Details
Vacuum and clean internal of Level 3 1000L grease trap. Dispose of waste off site
Check correct operation of cold water booster pump
Check correct operation of cold water transfer pump
Check correct operation of hot water circulation pumps at plantroom
Check domestic hot water plant and equipment for leaks and correct operation
Check cold water storage tank, fill valve and overflow for correct operation
Check roof outlets, sumps and overflows working correctly. Remove debris as required.
Check correct operation of sewer pump chamber on level 1
Check correct operation of stormwater pump chamber on level 1
Inspection completed by
Date:
396 Queen St - 12 Month Checks
Details
Vacuum and clean internal of Level 3 1000L grease trap. Dispose of waste off site
Check correct operation of cold water booster pump
Check correct operation of cold water transfer pump
Check correct operation of hot water circulation pumps at plantroom
Check domestic hot water plant and equipment for leaks and correct operation
Check cold water storage tank, fill valve and overflow for correct operation
Check roof outlets, sumps and overflows working correctly. Remove debris as required.
Check correct operation of sewer pump chamber on level 1
Check correct operation of stormwater pump chamber on level 1
Inspect and replace UV sterilization lamps in hot water return system
Test and certify 2x backflow prevention devices at level 1
Test and certify 2x backflow prevention devices at plant room
Inspection completed by
